ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $Profile.Name = "AV_Usuario_CaixaBank", AV_ByPassOpportunity_VR__c = false, ISCHANGED(CloseDate), ISCHANGED(Name ), ISCHANGED(StageName), OR( RecordType.DeveloperName = "CSBD_Accion_Comercial", RecordType.DeveloperName = "CSBD_Chat", RecordType.DeveloperName = "CSBD_CMB", RecordType.DeveloperName = "CSBD_CMN", RecordType.DeveloperName = "CSBD_Compra_Estrella", RecordType.DeveloperName = "CSBD_Desistimiento", RecordType.DeveloperName = "CSBD_DesistimientoPAI", RecordType.DeveloperName = "CSBD_Hipoteca", RecordType.DeveloperName = "CSBD_Prestamo", RecordType.DeveloperName = "CSBD_Renting", RecordType.DeveloperName = "CSBD_TPV" ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: No es posible realizar el cambio de Stage, Name o CloseDate.
